Support Quests and Items.name: [NEW] World Atlas
text: Support Quest: Earn 500 gold from this item to transform it into Runic Compass and gain the ability to hold wards.
Gold Generation: Gain a charge every 18 seconds, up to 3 charges. While nearby an ally champion, consume a charge to earn gold via the following methods:
Damaging abilities and attacks against champions or structures grant 30 (melee) / 28 (ranged) gold.
Killing a minion by any means grants you 20 gold and the nearest allied champion the same amount of gold they would have received had they killed the minion.

Support Quests and Items.name: [NEW] Runic Compass
text: Item Cost: Upgraded from World Atlas at 500 gold.
Support Quest: Earn 1000 gold from this item to transform it into Runic Compass and gain the ability to hold wards.
Gold Generation: Gain a charge every 18 seconds, up to 3 charges. While nearby an ally champion, consume a charge to earn gold via the following methods:
Damaging abilities and attacks against champions or structures grant 34 (melee) / 32 (ranged) gold.
Killing a minion by any means grants you 28 gold and the nearest allied champion the same amount of gold they would have received had they killed the minion.

Support Quests and Items.name: [NEW] Bounty of Worlds
text: You may notice Bounty of Worlds is almost exactly the same item as Runic Compass. Well you noticed right. Bounty of Worlds is an in-between state that allows the item to upgrade into any of the five support item upgrades! Once upgraded it served its purpose. Thank you Bounty of Worlds.
Item Cost: Upgraded from Runic Compass at 1000 gold

Support Quests and Items.name: [NEW] Celestial Opposition
text: Passive - Blessing of the Mountain: Become Blessed to reduce incoming champion damage by 40% (melee) / 25% (ranged), lingering for 2 seconds after taking damage from a champion. When the reduction wears off, unleash a shockwave around you that slows nearby enemies by 50% for 1.5 seconds. Effect refreshes after leaving combat for 15 seconds.

Support Quests and Items.name: [NEW] Solstice Sleigh
text: Passive: Slowing or Immobilizing an enemy champion grants you and a nearby ally with the lowest amount of health 120 bonus health and 90 movement speed for 4 seconds. 20 second cooldown.

Support Quests and Items.name: [NEW] Bloodsong
text: Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, your next attack is enhanced with an additional 75 physical damage on-hit (1.5 second cooldown). If the target is a champion, apply Expose Weakness, increasing the damage they take by 12% (melee) / 8% (ranged) for 6 seconds.

Support Quests and Items.name: [NEW] Dream Maker
text: Passive - Dream Maker: Gain a Blue Dream Bubble and a Purple Dream Bubble every 8 seconds. Healing and Shielding another ally blows both Dream Bubbles to them and empowers them for 3 seconds. Blue Bubble reduces 140 incoming damage on the next hit and Purple Bubble grants 90 bonus magic damage on the next hit.

Support Quests and Items.name: [NEW] Zaz'Zak's Realmspike
text: Passive - Void Explosion: Dealing ability damage to a champion causes an explosion at their current location that damages the target and nearby enemies, dealing 50 (+3% maximum health) magic damage, capped at 300 against monsters. 3 second cooldown.

Mage Items.name: Removed: Crown of the Shattered Queen, Everfrost, Leeching Leer, Demonic Embrace, Night Harvester, Luden's
[NEW] Malignance
text: Item Recipe: Lost Chapter + Fiendish Codex + 900 gold
Ultimate Power: Gain 15 Ability Haste for your Ultimate.

Ultimate Flames: Whenever you damage an enemy champion with your Ultimate, burn the ground beneath them for 3 seconds, dealing 60 (+6% AP) magic damage every second and reducing their Magic Resistance by (6-12 [level scaling]) for as long as they are on the burning ground.

Mage Items.name: [NEW] Caster's Companion
text: Item Recipe: Lost Chapter + Hextech Alternator + 700 gold
Load: Gain a Shot Charge every 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 6.

Fire: Damaging abilities consume all Shot charges to deal an additional 40 (+ 8% AP) magic damage to the target and one additional nearby target per charge. If there are insufficient targets in range, for each remaining Shot, repeat the damage on the primary target dealing 35% of the damage.

Mage Items.name: [NEW] Stormsurge
text: Item Recipe: Hextech Alternator + Aether Wisp + 950 gold
Passive - Stormraider: Dealing 35% of a champion's maximum health within 3 seconds applies Stormsurge to them and grants the user 25% movement speed for 2 seconds. 20 second cooldown.

Passive - Stormsurge: After 2 seconds, Stormsurge strikes the target with lightning, dealing 100-200 (based on level) (+ 50% AP) magic damage to them. If they die to the lightning or before the lightning strikes, it detonates immediately in a large area around them and you gain 30 gold.

Mage Items.name: [NEW] Haunting Guise
text: Item Recipe: Amplifying Tome + Ruby Crystal + 500 gold
Passive - Madness: For each second in combat with enemy champions, deal 2% bonus damage (maximum of 6%).

Mage Items.name: [NEW] Cryptbloom
text: Item Recipe: Blighting Jewel + Fiendish Codex + 850 gold

Passive - Life From Death: Whenever you get a takedown on an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them, create a healing nova on their location that heals allies for 50 (+50% AP). 60 second cooldown.

Mage Items.name: Riftmaker
text: Item Recipe: Haunting Guise + Fiendish Codex + 800 gold
Void Corruption: For each second in combat with enemy champions, deal 2% bonus damage (max 10%). At maximum strength, gain 10% (melee) / 6% (ranged) Omnivamp.
Void Infusion: Gain 2% of your bonus health as Ability Power.
Omnivamp updated with the following (now only exists on Riftmaker):
Omnivamp heals you for a percentage of damage you deal, with reduced effect (33% effectiveness) on minions and monsters.
Omnivamp heals you for the full amount with Pet or AOE damaged

Mage Items.name: Liandry's Torment
text: Item Recipe: Haunting Guise + Blasting Wand + 850 gold
Passive - Torment: Dealing damage with abilities causes enemies to burn for 2% maximum health magic damage per second for 3 seconds.
Passive - Suffering: For each second in combat with enemy champions, gain 2% bonus damage (max at 6% bonus damage).

Mage Items.name: Horizon Focus
text: Item Recipe: Hextech Alternator + Fiendish Codex + 700 gold
Passive - Hypershot: When you deal damage with Abilities to champions at 700 range or greater, reveal them for 6 seconds. Deal 10% increased damage to enemies revealed by Hypershot.
Passive - Focus: When revealing an enemy with Hypershot, reveal all other enemy champions within 1200 range of them for 2 seconds. 30 second cooldown.

Mage Items.name: Seeker's Armguard
text: Item Recipe: Amplifying Tome + Amplifying Tome + Cloth Armor + 500 gold

Active - Stasis: Use one time only to become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds. The user is prevented from taking any other actions during this time (transforms into Broken Armguard on use).

Mage Items.name: Shadowflame
text: Item Recipe: Needlessly Large Rod + Hextech Alternator + 850 gold
Passive - Cinderbloom: Magic damage and true damage critically strikes enemies below 35% health, dealing 20% increased damage (reduced to 30% increased damage for damage over time and pet effects).

Mage Items.name: Cosmic Drive
text: Item Recipe: Kindlegem + Aether Wisp + Fiendish Codex + 450 gold
Passive - Spelldance: Damaging an enemy champion with an ability grants bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

Mage Items.name: Amplifying Tome
text: Cost: 400 gold (can you believe we actually did it!?)

Mage Items.name: Rod of Ages
text: Item Recipe: Blasting Wand + Catalyst + 550 gold
This item gains 20 Health, 20 Mana, and 4 Ability Power every 60 seconds up to 10 times, for a maximum of 200 Health, 200 Mana, and 40 Ability Power. Upon reaching maximum stacks, gain a level.
Passive - Eternity: Restore Mana equal to 7% of premitigation damage taken from champions, and Health equal to 25% of Mana spent, up to 20 Health per cast, per second
Removed: For every 200 healing or mana restored with Eternity, gain 35% bonus movement speed that decays over 3 seconds.

Mage Items.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
text: Item Recipe: Needlessly Large Rod + Needlessly Large Rod + 1100 gold
Passive - Magical Opus: Increases your total Ability Power by 35%

Mage Items.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
text: Item Recipe: Needlessly Large Rod + Seeker's Armguard + 400 gold
Active - Time Stop: Enter Stasis for 2.50 seconds. 120-second cooldown.

Mage Items.name: Lich Bane
text: Item Recipe: Sheen + Aether Wisp + Hextech Alternator + 150 gold

Passive - Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional 57 = (100% base AD + 50% AP) magic damage on-hit. Spellblade grants 30% Attack Speed while available. 1.5 seconds cooldown.

Assassin Items.name: Removed: Duskblade of Draktharr, Prowler's Claw
[NEW] Voltaic Cyclosword
text: Item Recipe: The Brutalizer + Kircheis Shard + 863 gold
Passive - Energized: Moving and Attacking will generate an Energized Attack. Dashes and Stealth stack Energized 75% faster.
Passive - Firmament: Your Energized Attack applies 100 bonus physical damage and Slows enemies for 99% for 0.75 seconds. Slow is a melee only.

Assassin Items.name: [NEW] Profane Hydra
text: Item Recipe: Tiamat + The Brutalizer + 863 gold
Active - Heretical Slash: Deal 65% total Attack Damage physical damage to nearby enemies. This damage increases to 97.5% total Attack Damage physical damage to enemies below 30% health.
Passive - Cleave: Attacks deal 40% AD (melee) / 20% AD (ranged) damage to other units within 450 units of the target hit.

Assassin Items.name: [NEW] Hubris
text: Item Recipe: Serrated Dirk + Caulfield's Warhammer + 900 gold
Passive - Ego: When you kill an enemy champion you are granted a statue of yourself.
Passive - Eminence: When a champion that you have damaged within the last 3 seconds dies, gain 10 (+1 per Statue) Attack Damage for 60 seconds.

Assassin Items.name: [NEW] Opportunity
text: Item Recipe: Serrated Dirk + Nether Shard + 800 gold
Passive - Murder: After being out of combat with Champions for 8 seconds gains bonus Lethality. This Lethality lasts for 3 seconds after dealing damage to champions.
Passive - Murderspeed: If a champion dies within 3 seconds of damaging them, gain 150 decaying movement speed for 1.5 seconds.

Assassin Items.name: [NEW] The Brutalizer
text: Item Recipe: Glowing Mote + Pickaxe + 212 gold

Assassin Items.name: Serylda's Grudge
text: Item Recipe: Brutalizer + Last Whisper + 413 gold
Passive - Rancor: Gain 22 (+12%) Lethality Armor Penetration
Passive - Bitter Cold: Damaging abilities slow enemies below 50% Health by 30% for 1 second

Assassin Items.name: Zoomies
text: Item Recipe: Serrated Dirk + Rectrix + 800 gold
Passive - Murder: After being out of combat with Champions for 8 seconds gain Bonus Lethality. This Lethality lasts for 3 seconds after dealing damage to champions.
Passive - Murderspeed: If a champion dies within three seconds of damaging them, gain 150 decaying Move Speed for 1.5 seconds.

Assassin Items.name: Axiom Arc
text: Item Recipe: Brutalizer + Caulfield's Warhammer + 563 gold
Passive - Flux: Whenever a Champion dies within 3 seconds of you having damaged them, refund 10 = (10 + 35% Lethality)% of your Ultimate Ability's total cooldown.

Assassin Items.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
text: Item Recipe: Serrated Dirk + Rectrix + 800 gold
Passive - Haunt: Gain 40 Move Speed while out of combat.
Active - Wraith Step: Gain 20% Move Speed and Ghosting for 6 seconds. 45-second cooldown.
Ghosting: Ignore collision with other units.

Assassin Items.name: Umbral Glave
text: Item Recipe: Long Sword + Serrated Dirk + Long Sword + 800 gold
Passive - Blackout: When spotted by an enemy Ward, reveal traps and disable Wards around you for 8 seconds. Your attacks do 3x damage to Wards.

Tank Items.name: Removed: Turbo Chemtank, Radiant Virtue, Evenshroud, Gargoyle's Stoneplate, Aegis of the Legion, Lifewell
[NEW] Hollow Radiance
text: Item Recipe: Bami's Cinder + Spectre's Cowl + 550 gold

Passive - Immolate: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions) for 3 seconds. Taking or dealing damage refreshes the duration of this effect.
Passive - Moonburn: Killing an enemy (non-ward, non-structure) deals 30 (+3.5% bonus HP) magic damage in an area around them.

Tank Items.name: [NEW] Unending Despair
text: Item Recipe: Chain Vest + Kindlegem + Ruby Crystal + 800 gold
Passive: While in combat with champions, every 7 seconds, deal magic damage to nearby enemy champions, healing for 175% of the damage dealt.

Tank Items.name: [NEW] Kaenic Rookern
text: Item Recipe: Spectre's Cowl + Negatron Cloak + 850 gold
Passive - Magebane: After not taking damage from champions for 15 seconds, gain a magic shield for 18% of your maximum health.

Tank Items.name: Jak'Sho the Protean
text: Item Recipe: Chain Vest + Negatron Cloak + Ruby Crystal + 1100 gold

Passive - Voidborn Resilience: For each second in champion combat gain a stack, up to a maximum of 5 stacks. At maximum stacks become empowered, increasing your bonus resists by 25% until end of combat.

Tank Items.name: Dead Man's Plate
text: Item Recipe: Winged Moonplate + Chain Vest + Ruby Crystal + 1100 gold
Passive - Shipwrecker: While moving, build up to 40 bonus Move Speed. Your next Attack discharges built up Move Speed to deal up to 40 (+100% base AD) bonus physical damage.
Passive - Unsinkable: The strength of movement slowing effects is reduced by 25%.

Tank Items.name: Force of Nature
text: Item Recipe: Negatron Cloak + Winged Moonplate + Ruby Crystal + 700 gold

Passive - Absorb: Taking magic damage from enemy Champions grants a stack of Steadfast (up to a maximum of 8) for 7 seconds. Enemy Immobilizing effects grant an additional 2 stacks. One spell can add a new stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
Dissipate: While at 8 stacks of Steadfast, gain 60 Magic Resist and 10% increased Movement Speed.

Enchanter Items.name: Removed: Chemtech Putrifier, Chalice of Harmony
[NEW] Dawncore
text: Item Recipe: Bandleglass Mirror + Bandleglass Mirror + 700 gold
Passive - Dawncore: Gain 3% Heal and Shield Power and 5 Ability Power per 100% Base Mana Regeneration.
Passive - Summoner Spell Haste: Gain 18 Summoner Spell Haste.

Enchanter Items.name: Echoes of Helia
text: Item Recipe: Kindlegem + Bandleglass Mirror + 400 gold

Passive - Soul Siphon: Damaging a champion grants a Soul Shard, up to a maximum of 3. Healing or Shielding an ally consumes all Soul Shards and restores 20 Health and deals 55 magic damage per Shard to the nearest enemy champion.

Enchanter Items.name: Staff of Flowing Water
text: Item Recipe: Fiendish Codex + Forbidden Idol + 600 gold
Passive - Rapids: Healing or Shielding allied champions (excluding the user) grants the user 40 Ability Power and 10% bonus Movement Speed over 3 seconds.

Fighter Items.name: Removed: Goredrinker, Divine Sunderer, Silvermere Dawn, Ironspike Whip
[NEW] Sundered Sky
text: Item Recipe: Tunneler + Caulfield's Warhammer + 900 gold
Passive - Lightshield Strike: The first attack against a champion will critically strike for 150% damage and heals for 110% base AD +8% of missing health.

Fighter Items.name: Tiamat (Regained Active)
text: Item Recipe: Long Sword + Long Sword + 500 gold
Passive - Cleave: Attacks deal 40% AD (melee) / 20% AD (ranged) damage to other units within 450 units of the target hit.
Active - Crescent: Deal 60% physical damage to enemies around you. 10 second cooldown.

Fighter Items.name: Ravenous Hydra (Regained Active)
text: Item Recipe: Tiamat + Caulfield's Warhammer + Vampiric Scepter + 100 gold
Active - Ravenous Crescent: Deal 80% total Attack Damage physical damage to nearby enemies. This damage applies Lifesteal. 10 second cooldown.
Passive - Cleave: Attacks deal 40% AD (melee) / 20% AD (ranged) damage to other units within 450 units of the target hit.

Fighter Items.name: Titanic Hydra
text: Item Recipe: Tiamat + Tunneler + Ruby Crystal + 600 gold
Passive - Cleave: Attacks deal additional physical damage on-hit and deal physical damage to enemies behind the target.
Active - Titanic Crescent: On your next attack, Cleave will instead deal more physical damage in a larger area.

Fighter Items.name: [New] Nitro Hexaegis
text: Passive: After casting your ultimate, gain 35% attack speed and 15% bonus movement speed for 7 seconds.

Fighter Items.name: [New] Tunneler
text: Item Recipe: Long Sword + Ruby Crystal + 350 gold

Fighter Items.name: Hullbreaker
text: Item Recipe: Tunneler + Nether Shard + Pickaxe + 125 gold

Passive - Skipper: Basic attacks grant a stack (up to a maximum of 5 stacks). Attacking an enemy champion or epic monster while at max stacks consumers all stacks to deal 150% base AD bonus physical damage, increased to 400% against structures.
Passive - Boarding Part: Nearby allied Siege and Super Minions gain 15-90 bonus armor and magic resistance (based on level).

Fighter Items.name: Stridebreaker
text: Item Recipe: Phage + Pickaxe + Dagger + 725 gold
Active - Halting Slash: Slow enemies in a radius centered around you by 25% and gain 25% bonus movement speed per champion hit that decays over 2 seconds. Can move while casting. 15 second cooldown.
Passive - Heroic Gait: Dealing physical damage grants you 20 bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

Fighter Items.name: Wit's End
text: Item Recipe: Recurve Bow + Negatron Cloak + Dagger + 1000 gold
Passive - Fray: Attacks apply 15 magic damage on-hit.

Fighter Items.name: Trinity Force
text: Item Recipe: Sheen + Phage + Hearthbound Axe + 33 gold
Passive - Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional 114 = (200% base physical damage). 1.5 seconds cooldown.
Passive - Quicken: Attacking a unit grants 20 Move Speed for 2 seconds.

Fighter Items.name: Black Cleaver
text: Item Recipe: Kindlegem + Caulfield's Warhammer + Long Sword + 750 gold
Passive - Carve: Dealing physical damage to a champion applies a stack of 4% Armor reduction for 6 seconds (max 24% Armor reduction).
Passive - Furror: Attacking a unit grants 20 Move Speed for 2 seconds.

Fighter Items.name: Spear of Shojin
text: Item Recipe: Kindlegem + Caulfield's Warhammer + Pickaxe + 325 gold
Passive - Dragonforce: Your non-ultimate spells gain 15 Ability Haste
Passive - Focused Will: Spell hits grant stacks, up to 3. Your spells deal 3% increased damage for each stack (up to 9%).
Item performance will differ for melee and ranged users.

Fighter Items.name: Phage
text: Item Recipe: Ruby Crystal + Long Sword + 350 gold
Passive - Rage: Attacking a unit grants 20 movement speed for 2 seconds.

Fighter Items.name: Steel Sigil
text: Item Recipe: Long Sword + Cloth Armor + 550 gold

Marksmen Items.name: [NEW] Terminus
text: Item Recipe: Recurve Bow + Last Whisper + Dagger + 750 gold
Passive - Shadow: Attacks apply 30 magic damage on-hit.

Passive - Juxtaposition: Alternate between Light and Dark on-hits each attack. Light attacks grant 3-5 armor and magic resist (up to 15-25) for 5 seconds. Dark attacks grant 6% armor penetration and magic penetration (up to 30%) for 5 seconds.

Marksmen Items.name: Guardian Angel
text: Item Recipe: B.F. Sword + Steel Sigil + 950 gold (Note: Stopwatch has been removed)
Passive - Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, restores 50% of base health and 100% of maximum mana after 4 seconds of stasis. 300 second cooldown.

Marksmen Items.name: Phantom Dancer
text: Item Recipe: Hearthbound Axe + Cloak of Agility + 1000 gold
Passive - Spectral Waltz: On-attack, basic attacks grant ghosting and a stack of 7% bonus attack speed up to 5 stacks (maximum 35% bonus attack speed).

Marksmen Items.name: Infinity Edge
text: Item Recipe: B.F. Sword + Pickaxe + Cloak of Agility + 525 gold
